response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and significance, we believe it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering this, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive chance to own a piece that could be worth much more in the future. We hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing further details with you.", "product_price": 12000}
